comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0 MozOS/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

in the main chrome manifest add this

manifest ../myapp.manifest

create that file and add some content

content myapp myapp/

put any file in that directory
and try to navigate to it with

chrome://myapp/content/yourfile


Actual results:

nothing in windows


Expected results:

the same as linux
